alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 2:46PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Ceiba, Humacao, Juncos, Las Piedras and Naguabo. * WHEN...Until 445 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 145 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Humacao, Naguabo, Las Piedras, Juncos, Ceiba, Anton Ruiz, Punta Santiago, La Fermina, Aguas Claras, Roosevelt Roads, Rio Blanco, Pena Pobre, Bajandas, Duque, Pueblito Del Rio, El Mango, Candelero Arriba and Daguao.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Ceiba; Humacao; Juncos; Las Piedras; Naguabo
